page.title: 08TRAFFIC 1
page.content: Towcester roads are very busy as there is a major crossroads in the centre. This is where the{A5}crosses the{A43.} The{A5}goes to{Milton Keynes}and {Daventry}and the{A43}goes to {Northampton}and{Oxford.}Towcester is fast becoming a commuter town for Milton Keynes, which explains why a lot of the traffic is going that way. The A45 is the only main road from the Northampton area that goes South, which means that traffic tends to build up on this road especially at sunny weekends and during the summer months. To add to the congestion that occurs, these roads are also used for all the traffic on route to the {Silverstone}or{Towcester races.
